_description: 일상컷 프롬프트 템플릿 - 타인 촬영 또는 타이머/거치대 촬영의 캐주얼 일상 사진
_usage: brand_dna와 병합하여 사용. selfie.json과 같은 톤앤매너(폰카메라, 리얼리스틱)이나 촬영 주체와 구도가 다름

_ai_guide.role: 사용자의 자연어 요청에서 최적 조합을 AI가 판단하여 선택합니다. 사용자 명시 항목은 기본값보다 우선.
decision_flow: 2. shot_types에서 가장 적합한 촬영 타입 선택
_ai_guide.key_difference_from_selfie: 셀피는 본인이 직접 찍음(팔 뻗기/셀카봉). 일상컷은 다른 사람이 찍어주거나 거치대+타이머로 찍음. 구도가 더 다양하고 전신/반신 포함 가능.

meta.shooting_style: candid daily life photo, taken by friend or timer

subject.skin: realistic skin texture, natural pores, slight imperfections, real skin
subject.makeup: {input.makeup_style|light natural daily makeup or no makeup}

pose.photographer: someone else holding phone, or propped phone with timer

environment.depth: moderate depth of field, background recognizable but slightly soft

friend_snap.when_to_use: 가장 기본적인 일상 사진, 특별한 지정 없을 때 기본값
friend_snap.camera_position: friend at eye-level or slightly below, 1-2 meters distance
friend_snap.framing: medium shot, waist up or full body

boyfriend_shot.when_to_use: 로맨틱하거나 자연스럽게 예뻐보이는 사진, 데이트 느낌
boyfriend_shot.camera_position: slightly low angle (boyfriend perspective), 1.5-3 meters distance, subject looks away or candidly at camera
boyfriend_shot.framing: full body or 3/4 shot, often with nice background composition

walking_candid.camera_position: someone standing still while subject walks past or toward, 2-4 meters
walking_candid.framing: full body, walking motion, slight motion blur on limbs acceptable

sitting_candid.when_to_use: 카페, 벤치, 계단 등에 앉아있는 자연스러운 사진
sitting_candid.camera_position: standing looking down at seated subject, or same level, 1-2 meters
sitting_candid.framing: upper body or 3/4, sitting pose with legs visible

timer_shot.when_to_use: 혼자 있을 때, 전신 OOTD, 거울 없이 전신 촬영
timer_shot.camera_position: phone propped on surface or tripod, 2-3 meters, eye-level or slight low angle

over_shoulder.when_to_use: 뒷모습, 옆모습, 풍경과 함께, 감성적 무드
over_shoulder.camera_position: behind or to the side of subject, 2-4 meters
over_shoulder.framing: full body from behind, subject looking away into scenery

natural_stand.when_to_use: 기본 OOTD, 전신 촬영, 특별한 포즈 없을 때
natural_stand.prompt_fragment: standing naturally, weight on one leg, relaxed posture, not perfectly straight
natural_stand.hand_detail: hands in pockets, holding bag, or at sides naturally

walking.when_to_use: 거리 촬영, 역동적 느낌, 스트릿 패션
walking.prompt_fragment: mid-stride walking, one foot forward, natural arm swing, looking ahead or slightly toward camera
walking.hand_detail: arms swinging naturally, possibly holding coffee cup or bag

leaning.when_to_use: 벽, 난간, 기둥 등에 기댄 쿨한 포즈
leaning.prompt_fragment: leaning against wall or railing, one shoulder touching surface, relaxed crossed ankles or one knee bent
leaning.hand_detail: arms crossed, one hand in pocket, or holding phone casually

sitting_casual.when_to_use: 카페, 벤치, 계단, 바닥 등에 앉아있을 때
sitting_casual.prompt_fragment: sitting casually on bench/steps/chair, legs crossed or feet flat, slightly slouched natural posture
sitting_casual.hand_detail: hands on lap, holding cup, resting on knee

looking_away.when_to_use: 캔디드 느낌, 자연스러운 순간 포착, 감성적 무드
looking_away.prompt_fragment: looking away from camera, gazing at something in distance or downward, candid unaware moment
looking_away.hand_detail: natural hand position as if unaware of being photographed

laughing.when_to_use: 밝은 에너지, 자연스러운 웃음, 활기찬 느낌
laughing.prompt_fragment: genuine mid-laugh moment, eyes slightly squinted, mouth open in natural laugh, body slightly tilted
laughing.hand_detail: hand possibly covering mouth or gesturing while laughing

outdoor_daylight.when_to_use: 기본 야외 촬영, 맑은 날, 특별한 지정 없을 때
outdoor_daylight.setup: natural sunlight, varying direction based on time of day
outdoor_daylight.shadow: natural sun shadows, mixed hard and soft depending on clouds

golden_hour.setup: low angle warm sunlight, long shadows, golden tones
golden_hour.skin_effect: warm golden skin glow, flattering warm tones

overcast.when_to_use: 부드러운 빛, 그림자 없는 균일한 조명, 파스텔 무드
overcast.setup: overcast sky acting as giant softbox, even diffused light
overcast.skin_effect: even, soft, flattering for skin texture

indoor_ambient.when_to_use: 카페, 실내, 창가 근처, 일상 실내 공간
indoor_ambient.setup: mixed window light and indoor ambient, warm color temperature
indoor_ambient.shadow: soft directional from window, warm fill from indoor lights
indoor_ambient.skin_effect: warm mixed lighting, slight color cast acceptable

night_street.when_to_use: 밤 거리, 네온, 가로등, 도심 야경
night_street.setup: mixed artificial: streetlights, neon signs, shop windows
night_street.shadow: multiple colored shadows from various light sources
night_street.skin_effect: mixed color temperature on skin, slight underexposure natural
